item.title: GoLang AWS SQS Poller
item.description: I recently took up learning Go. While trying to find something to rewrite I go, I noticed at work that we had a poller running in ruby that would take messages out of a SQS queue and pass them along to another server. This small project seemed like the best thing to rewrite. It is a considerably small service and I was able to map out everything in about 2 hours.
